#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Release 0.1 =

Kinds of mapping managed:
* One to one,
* One to many,
* Many to one,
* Many to many.

Error management :
* Error file in CSV,
* Error reason file in TXT format.

Header management (could be removed).

* Aggregation of amounts.
